description:
Banish the shivers on chilly belays, backcountry ski transitions or winter camping trips. The RAB Electron Jacket uses premium 800-fill-power water-repellent goose down to wrap you in you toasty warmth. Small baffles reduce bulk in the shoulders, while large ones eliminate cold spots in the torso where you feel the cold most. Wear it under your shell, or let the Pertex Quantam shell fabric shed light precip and wind when you wear it on its own.

  • Exterior is lightweight Pertex Quantum nylon with a DWR finish for excellent water and wind resistance
  • Premium 800-fill-power Nikwax Hydrophobic goose down insulation dries faster, maintains loft better and retains less moisture than traditional down
  • Insulation meets the Responsible Down Standard for animal welfare
  • Helmet-compatible adjustable hood has a stiffened peak that won't droop into your eyes
  • YKK front zip has an internal storm flap and a cozy chin guard
  • 2 zippered hand pockets
  • Low-profile elastic cuffs and drawcord hem seal in heat
  • Includes a stuff sack for easy storage in your backpack when conditions warm up
name: Rab Electron Pro Jacket - Women's
